colourLight

public void colourLight(Light myLight,
                        ou.OUColour colourColour)
This method should set the colour of the specified light to the specified colour if it is one of OUColour.RED, OUColour.GREEN, OUColour.ORANGE or OUColour.BLACK. Otherwise the colour should be unchanged.

Find out how many times red lights should flash at the crossing. Simulates length of train at crossing.
